title.value: NIH Workshop Webcast Recording: Single IRBs

body.value:
On September 12, 2018, NIH held a Workshop on Single IRB (sIRB) Resource and Infrastructure Development.  The workshop focused on successful strategies and lessons learned for modifying and enhancing institutional IRB infrastructure for single IRB review of multi-site studies.

Use the buttons below to view the agenda, watch the recording, or access additional information including presenter biographies, sIRB policies and resources, and links to watch individual sessions from the workshop.

[button url="https://osp.od.nih.gov/wp-content/uploads/sIRB_Agenda.pdf" size="medium" color="blue" target="_blank"]View Agenda[/button]
[button url="https://videocast.nih.gov/summary.asp?Live=28533&bhcp=1" size="medium" color="green" target="_blank"]Watch Recording[/button]
[button url="https://osp.od.nih.gov/event/single-irb-review-workshop/" size="medium" color="orange" target="_blank"]More Info[/button]

field_subtitle.value: Single IRB Review for Multi-Site Research Resource and Infrastructure Development Workshop
